AblifyNow

Welcome to MapAbility! MapAbility is an innovative, feasible to implement, and easy-to-use web application allowing users to search, record, and discuss regarding the accessibility of certain locales for persons with disabilities (PwD). Interested in finding accessible locations or working with a community of changemakers to bring reform -- check out MapAbility!
